content: *colorful granny squares are combined along with a 5-row border edging of clusters and picot lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # voktg-blanket skill level beginner + level 2 microspun article #910 5 colors 10 balls total crochet hook - size e-4 3 5 mm gauge each square approx 3 in x 3 in 7 5cm x 7 5cm using size e/4 3 50mm crochet hook special stitch cluster work 56 4-round granny squares see placement diagram for color sequence of each square arrange squares 7 x 8 following placement diagram for colorways and join together crochet picot edging to finish
